title: Piz di Sassiglion
text: Piz di Sassiglion (2,855 m) is a <a href="mountain">mountain</a> of the <a href="Livigno%20Alps">Livigno Alps</a>, located on the border between <a href="Switzerland">Switzerland</a> and <a href="Italy">Italy</a>. It is the highest summit of the chain south of the Passo di Malghera. The mountain lies east of <a href="Poschiavo">Poschiavo</a> (Graubünden) and west of the Val Grosina (Lombardy).
